quiz.name: Name the President
quiz.description: Identify the president who was in office during the year stated, based off the provided clues

questions.question: Which president was in office in 1790, and can be found in our wallets too?
Which president was in office in 1841, but only for a record short 32 days?
Donald Trump follows which only other president to serve non-consecutive terms, in office in 1886 as well as 1895?

quiz.name: All About the Constitution
quiz.description: See how well you really know the US Constitution!

questions.question: How many amendments have been written into law?
The US Constitution is the oldest and shortest written Constitution of any major government! Around how many words was the original document?
Not every founding father took part in signing the Constitution! Which of the following people did NOT sign the Constitution?
